description: This file defines a React functional component named `VideoPlayer` that wraps the Video.js library to embed a video player with custom controls and overlay UI. It manages the Video.js player instance lifecycle using React hooks, and accepts props for video source, poster image, and an onReady callback.

methods.name: VideoPlayer
methods.description: React component that initializes and manages the Video.js player instance, setting up controls, playback rates, and handling source/poster updates.
